info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Madison, south central Beaverhead and south central Jefferson Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Silver Star to 15 miles south of Lima. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Twin Bridges, Lima, Alder, Silver Star, Pony, Monida, Cardwell, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park, Laurin, Waterloo and Snowline. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
